title: The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 30
description:
The Financial and Economic Crisis - Collection 30:

We have 35 titles here:

-  Alworth & Arachi - Taxation and the Financial Crisis (2012)

-  Ari (Ed.) - The European Debt Crisis; Causes, Consequences, Measures and Remedies (2014)

-  Arvidsson & Peitersen - The Ethical Economy; Rebuilding Value After the Crisis (2013)

-  Barth & Kaufman - The First Great Financial Crisis of the 21st Century; a Retrospective (2016)

-  Berton - The Great Depression, 1929-1939 (1990)

-  Bilginsoy - A History of Financial Crises; Dreams and Follies of Expectations (2015)

-  Bogle - Don't Count on it; Reflections on Investment Illusions, Capitalism, Mutual Funds, Indexing,.. (2011)

-  Brada & Wachtel (Eds.) - Global Banking Crises and Emerging Markets (2016)

-  Cable - The Storm; the World Economic Crisis & What It Means (2009)

-  Das - The Age of Stagnation; Why Perpetual Growth is Unattainable and the Global Economy is in Peril (2016)

-  Deville - Lived Economics of Default; Consumer Credit, Debt Collection and the Capture of Affect (2015)

-  Dimsdale & Hotson (Eds.) - British Financial Crises since 1825 (2014)

-  Fishbein - Popping the Higher Education Bubble; How to Navigate the Impending Student Loan Crisis (2014)

-  Fox - The Myth of the Rational Market; a History of Risk, Reward, and Delusion on Wall Street (2009)

-  Han - Central Bank Regulation and the Financial Crisis; a Comprehensive Analysis (2016)

-  Hartmann - The Crash of 2016; the Plot to Destroy America-and What We Can Do to Stop It (2013)

-  Helleiner - The Status Quo Crisis; Global Financial Governance After the 2008 Meltdown (2014)

-  Hudson - Killing the Host; How Financial Parasites and Debt Bondage Destroy the Global Economy (2015)

-  Hyman - Borrow; the American Way of Debt (2012)

-  Karasavvoglou et al (Eds.) - The First Decade of Living with the Global Crisis; Economic and Social Development in the Balkans.. (2016)

-  Komlos - Principles of Economics for a Post-Meltdown World (2016)

-  Lack - Wall Street Potholes; Insights from Top Money Managers on Avoiding Dangerous Products (2016)

-  MacEwan & Miller - Economic Collapse, Economic Change; Getting to the Roots of the Crisis (2015)

-  Malloch & Mamorsky - The End of Ethics and a Way Back; How to Fix a Fundamentally Broken Global Financial System (2013)

-  Meiers - Germany's Role in the Euro Crisis; Berlin's Quest for a More Perfect Monetary Union (2015)

-  Millet & Toussaint - Who Owes Who; 50 Questions about World Debt (2004)

-  Napier - Anatomy of the Bear; Lessons from Wall Street's Four Great Bottoms, 4e (2016)

-  Orrell - Economyths; How the Science of Complex Systems is Transforming Economic Thought (2010)

-  Perkins - The New Confessions of an Economic Hit Man (2016)

-  Schenker - Recession-Proof; How to Survive and Thrive in an Economic Downturn (2016)

-  Sumner - The Midas Paradox; Financial Markets, Government Shocks, and the Great Depression (2015)

-  Varoufakis - And the Weak Suffer What They Must; Europe's Crisis and America's Economic Future (2016)

-  Winkler et al (Eds.) - A Flow-of-Funds Perspective on the Financial Crisis; Vol. I, Money, Credit and Sectoral Balance Sheets (2014)

-  Winkler et al (Eds.) - A Flow-of-Funds Perspective on the Financial Crisis; Vol. II, Macroeconomic Imbalances and Risks to Financial Stability (2014)

-  Zestos - The Global Financial Crisis; From US Subprime Mortgages to European Sovereign Debt (2016)
